title: Verve Coffee Roasters French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 30 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 30g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 480g hot water in slow spiral
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start your timer. Pour 480 grams of hot water in a slow, deliberate spiral. You have 25 seconds. Covering all the grounds ensures even extraction.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir gently with wooden spoon to saturate all grounds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently with a wooden spoon. You have 30 seconds. Make sure all the coffee is fully saturated.

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
brewing_steps.audio_script: Place the lid on top to retain heat, but do not press the plunger yet. Let the coffee steep.
Now wait for 5 minutes. This time allows for a full, robust extraction, developing the coffee's body and sweetness.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press plunger down slowly, pour within 15 seconds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Press the plunger down slowly. Pour immediately within 15 seconds to enjoy the coffee at its peak.

what_to_expect.description: Verve Coffee's French Press method emphasizes sustainability and community. The wooden spoon prevents scratching, while the precise timing and medium-coarse grind create a balanced cup with excellent body and clarity.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Verve Coffee combines sustainability with quality. Using a wooden spoon and precise timing, this method delivers a balanced cup with excellent body and clarity.
